rows.label: tev001701_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello. Is there something you wished to discuss?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm speaking with someone else right now,
so you'll have to wait until we're finished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I would very much like to help with whatever is
troubling you. So I hope you'll come back and ask
me again very soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1001
rows.name:
Hello, [ST:playername ].
Will this be another day of running around New LA
and helping people through their problems?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1002
rows.name:
If it wouldn't be a bother, I would be most grateful
if you'd allow me to accompany you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1003
rows.name: Thank you very much. I promise not to slow you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1004
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1009
rows.name:
All of us will have to work harder to fill the void
left by Nelson and his team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1010
rows.name:
With that said, if it wouldn't be too much of a bother,
might I join you on your mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1011
rows.name:
So we're headed to Noctilum? Then we'll want to 
be extremely well prepared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1012
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1017
rows.name:
...The unidentified xenoforms that have been spotted
in Oblivia? Yes, I've heard of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1018
rows.name:
Whatever world they hail from, we all have a duty to
assist those in need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1019
rows.name: Let's hurry to their rescue. I'll do anything to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1020
rows.name:
I'm confident that I can surmount any threat when
I have you fighting beside me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1021
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1022
rows.name:
Hello, [ST:playername ].
I'm afraid someone has come to me with a particularly
serious matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1023
rows.name: I need to focus on resolving this situation right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1024
rows.name:
If you were hoping for my assistance with a mission,
I am so terribly sorry. Please promise that you'll return
safely without me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1029
rows.name:
Searching for pieces of the Lifehold is a vital task
indeed, but the lives of those searching are more
important still.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1030
rows.name:
No amount of losses are acceptable to me.
We have to rescue Irina. Please bring me along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1031
rows.name:
I am confident that I can surmount any threat when
I have you fighting beside me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1032
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1037
rows.name:
Many lives were lost and many people wounded
in the recent attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1038
rows.name:
But we have little time left. So I fear we must fight
through the pain and struggle onward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1039
rows.name:
Would it be an imposition if I asked to join you?
However modest the job, I want to do something that
will bring a sliver of hope to our dispirited neighbors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1040
rows.name:
I am confident that I can surmount any threat when
I have you fighting beside me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1041
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1042
rows.name:
Recently many people have been coming to me
to discuss the time limit on their mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1043
rows.name:
Everyone is trying to project confidence around those
who are unaware, but most seem plagued by doubt
and anxiety from within.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1044
rows.name:
Please allow me to help you. Finding the Lifehold Core
is the only way we can bring peace to their hearts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1045
rows.name:
I am confident that I can surmount any threat when
I have you fighting beside me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1046
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1051
rows.name:
I believe that if we confront Lao directly, he will
acknowledge his crime and repent for his behavior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1052
rows.name:
But we must speak with him first, for that is the human
thing to do. I would be happy to help if you need me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1053
rows.name:
Let us hurry. We have to reach Lao before he crosses
a point of no return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1054
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1055
rows.name:
When the White Whale set sail, we left a great many
people behind on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1056
rows.name:
We carry the weight of all those who weren't chosen.
We have a duty to live on in the stead of those who
could not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1057
rows.name:
Please take me with you. I want to play a part in this
battleâ€”whatever small role it may be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1058
rows.name:
Thank you. Let us go and fulfill the duty we bear
for all mankind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1059
rows.name:
I understand. If I can ever be of any help to you,
please let me know. You can ask me anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1064
rows.name:
The Lifehold Core has been secured, but the hearts of
our people remain beset by worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1065
rows.name:
I hope you will allow me to continue assisting you
in making this world a happier place for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Hope to your team.

rows.label: tev001701_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001701_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Hope's request for now.

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1066
rows.name:
Then let's be off. I know there is no challenge I cannot
overcome with you by my side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001701_MSG1067
rows.name:
Whatever comes, I will always be here to listen.
I want to be of use to you in any way I can.[ST:wait ]
